mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Hot Line - Late News", "As I See It", "Let's Count the Basics", "What Are They Dancing?", "A History of Square Dancing", "Smoother Dancing Poster", "Take a Good Look - Flip Back", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Bill and Betty Beattie", "Callers Text - Chapter Thirty", "Style Lab - Hinge and Trade", "Ladies on the Square", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "23rd National Square Dance Convention", "Caller of the Month: Ed Fraidenburg", "Square Dance Date Book", "More of Grundeen's World", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
